## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | This order size allows for a 1-day lead time while accommodating forecasted demand with a margin of error. It also utilizes a vendor order quantity that efficiently maximizes the discount threshold. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | This is lower than the player's planned order size, but it ensures adequate stock coverage with less potential for excess inventory.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.7 days (assuming sales are spread evenly over the five days) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 9 days (including current stock)          |
| Comments                          | Ordering in multiples of 20,000 will ensure the discount threshold is reached for future replenishments, while ensuring adequate stock levels for the next five days.  |
